heading: Kor Dragan Barracks Dungeon Guide
content: Kor Dragan Barracks offers Barbarians the extremely valuable for bleed builds, giving you a quick source of stun for leveling. However, the monsters here make the dungeon quite long for completion time, making this a poor choice for repeated grinding. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
